name: Valkyria Survival
description:
---NOTE---

You might get a bug where the character moves on her own without any input. Simply press the arrow key in that direction and it should fix itself. 

This is a very simple game I made while trying to figure out how to make games using Godot.  Hope you have some fun with it!

---CONTROLS & TIPS---

Use arrow keys to move, press z to attack.
Survive as long as possible while killing enemies!

You only die if you get hit in the torso. Use this to your advantage!

Time your attacks! Only the spear tip does damage so if the enemy gets too close you can't hurt them!

There is a brief period where you can't avoid enemies while attacking so don't spam attacks!

You have a wide overhead swing, but are vulnerable from below. Keep an eye out!
